project_abstract.cdata: The primary objectives of the Heilongjiang Agricultural Development Project are to raise incomes and living standards, stimulate market-oriented enterprise development in rural Heilongjiang industries, and expand rural employment by increasing livestock and aquaculture production and expanding or improving crop and livestock processing.  The main features of the project are; a) expansion of livestock raising including cattle, pigs, geese, and fox; b) aquaculture, including expansion and improvement of facilities for carp polyculture; c) agroprocessing, including construction of new and expansion and improvement of existing facilities for processing milk, beef, pigs and geese, cereals, oilseeds, beans and fruit; and d) institutional development, including strengthening of livestock and crop supporting services, technical assistance and training.

P038988.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>黑龙江农业发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是：通过扩大畜牧和水产生产规模、扩大或增加农牧业加工等措施，增加农村收入，提高生活水平，促进黑龙江农村企业市场化发展，增加农村就业。本项目的主要内容是：（1）扩畜牧业养殖包括猪、牛、鹅和狐狸等养殖规模；（2）发展水产养殖，包括鲤鱼混养设施改扩建；（3）发展农产品加工业，包括新建牛奶、牛肉、猪肉、鹅肉、谷物、油菜籽、大豆和水果加工设施，对现有加工设施进行改扩建；（4）开展制度建设，包括加强农牧业支持性服务、技术援助和培训。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
